Package ORM

Class MetaData

java.lang.Object
ORM.MetaData
public final class MetaData
extends java.lang.Object
Class for all kinds of metadata extraction, handling, manipulation, etc... .

  • Method Details

    • getAnnotationTableName

      public static java.lang.String getAnnotationTableName​(java.lang.Class<?> type)
      Retrieves the annotated database table name of a class, if set. If no table name annotation set, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      type - Class that will be searched for a table name annotation.
      Returns:
      Either the table name as String or throws an exception (null theoretically not reachable).

    • isPrimary

      public static boolean isPrimary​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Checks a reflection field for the custom primary key annotation.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      True or false, depending on if annotation is set.

    • isAutoIncrement

      public static boolean isAutoIncrement​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Checks a reflection field for the custom auto increment annotation.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      True or false, depending on if annotation is set.

    • isForeign

      public static boolean isForeign​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Checks a reflection field for the custom foreign key annotation.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      True or false, depending on if annotation is set.

    • isIgnore

      public static boolean isIgnore​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Checks a reflection field for the custom ignore annotation.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      True or false, depending on if annotation is set.

    • isNullable

      public static boolean isNullable​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Checks a reflection field for the custom nullable annotation.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      True or false, depending on if annotation is set.

    • getForeignColumn

      public static java.lang.String getForeignColumn​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Retrieves the annotated database foreign column name of a class, if set. If no column name annotation set, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      Annotated foreign column name as String.

    • getForeignTable

      public static java.lang.String getForeignTable​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Retrieves the annotated database foreign table name of a class, if set. If no table name annotation set, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      field - Java reflection field.
      Returns:
      Annotated foreign table name as String.

    • buildTableName

      public static java.lang.String buildTableName​(java.lang.String name)
      Little helper function to get normed table names.
      Parameters:
      name - Simple name of class without @Table Annotation or empty tableName
      Returns:
      String construct of "t_" + class name in lower case.

    • toColumnType

      public static java.lang.Object toColumnType​(Field field, java.lang.Object object)
      traverses custom Classes for foreign key types and converts LocalDate to SQL.Date.
      Parameters:
      field - the field as argument for entity access.
      object - the field as object for value returning.
      Returns:
      Either a new object with a "simple" type, a SQL.Date object or the original object if it was simple enough.

    • toFieldType

      public static java.lang.Object toFieldType​(Field field, java.lang.Object object)
      Converts java.sql.Date to java.time.LocalDate format.
      Parameters:
      field - Field that will be checked if local field needs conversion.
      object - Value as object.
      Returns:
      Converted or original object.

    • parseType

      public static java.lang.String parseType​(java.lang.String type, int length)
      Type parser for different java types to Database types.
      Parameters:
      type - Java type as string.
      length - Optional length if set in custom class.
      Returns:
      Database var type as String.
